title: Saturn Transit in the 7th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Saturn transiting the seventh house brings maturity tests to partnerships and commitments for Leo ascendants. Relationships demand realism, responsibility, and patience. Superficial bonds weaken, while sincere alliances grow stronger through effort and accountability. Business partnerships require clear terms and long-term vision. Though emotional warmth may feel restrained, this phase builds trust, stability, and respect when boundaries and fairness guide interactions.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Greater awareness of responsibilities in partnerships

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Marriage and close bonds face reality checks

sections.heading: Finance
points: Slow but stable gains via partnerships

closing: This transit refines how you commit and cooperate. With patience and fairness, partnerships become pillars of strength.
